taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have an enquiry opened in your editor
taskbody.context:
There are two different ways of sorting fields in enquiry:
Order of fields definition: T24 evaluates enquiry fields respecting the order in enquiry definition. This order matters when you have dependencies between fields inside the enquiry.
Order of columns when running the enquiry: This applies to visible fields only, becoming columns at runtime. Column order is based on column position value set on field properties.

step.cmd: Drag&drop the field to move in the Data Output tab within the list of fields to the appropriate rank.
step.stepresult: Field is moved inside the model. You can check the change in the DSL editor. The column position value remains unchanged.

step.cmd: Drag&drop the field to move in the Presentation tab within the list of column to the appropriate position.
step.stepresult: Field column position is automatically changed accordingly. This action doesn't changes the field rank in the model.

step.cmd: Click OK to save your changes.
